New Records: Kutter Crawford became the first Boston Red Sox starter with 30 starts since Nick Pivetta in 2022
Key Match Events: Red Sox offense struggled, losing 5-3 to the Baltimore Orioles
Cedric Mullins hit two home runs against Kutter Crawford
Red Sox cut into the deficit but ultimately fell short
Pre-Game Insights: Manager Alex Cora said the team needs to show up and play to win the series
Red Sox pitching has stabilized but the offense has yet to find its groove again
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Alex Cora said the offense has struggled for a prolonged stretch
The Red Sox are now four games behind Minnesota for third place in the American League wild-card standings
Miscellaneous Highlights: Red Sox have 1,405 strikeouts, an average of roughly 9 1/2 strikeouts per game
Strikeouts have become an increasing problem for the club
Others: Kutter Crawford gave up a solo homer in the first to Cedric Mullins on a four-seamer and then a two-run homer in the third to Mullins on a cutter
Crawford said he made an adjustment after the second home run and struck out Anthony Santander to escape the threat
